name: Mohamed
text: Perfect with fansy surroundings. Close to Manara Mall.

name: Jabir
room_type: Superior Guest room, 2 Twin/Single Bed(s), Garden view

name: Mouhcine
room_type: Superior Guest room, 2 Twin/Single Bed(s), Garden view
text: The location of the hotel is 25 min by foot from Gueliz and Jamaa El Fna. The hotel has all the facilities required and is surrounded by big gardens :) I would recommend the hotel to anyone who wants peace of mind without being to far from the medina.

name: Cynthia
room_type: Superior Guest room, 2 Twin/Single Bed(s), Garden view
text: Beautiful gardens and swimming pool with comfortable sun loungers. Good breakfast with lots of options. Extremely courteous and friendly staff.

name: Taimur
room_type: Deluxe Guest room, 1 King, Pool view
text: The whole environment was serine. Pool was clean and breakfast has lavish menu. The best thing is that right across the rood is Menara Mall which is a hub for night time cafes and people chill there.

name: Bavinder
text: The hotel is across the road from the mall, so access to restaurants is ideal. It’s close to the old medina and the airport is only 15/20 mins away. The grounds are spacious and the hotel is pleasant. Staff are very helpful.

name: Imane
room_type: Superior Guest room, 2 Twin/Single Bed(s), Garden view
text: All was good, thanks to the all Team

name: Muhammad
text: First night Airconditioner did not work but second night we were upgraded and room and Airconditioner were excellent.

name: Alhajie
room_type: Superior Guest room, 2 Twin/Single Bed(s), Garden view
